Name: NodePlacementConfiguration
SummaryComment: Node placement configuration for a pool.
RemarkComment: For regional placement, nodes in the pool will be allocated in the same region. For zonal placement, nodes in the pool will be spread across different zones with best effort balancing.

Key.Name: Policy
Key.SummaryComment: Node placement Policy type on Batch Pools.
Key.RemarksComment: Allocation policy used by Batch Service to provision the nodes. If not specified, Batch will use the regional policy.
